claim_card.claim: A computational pathway is proposed: simulate/learn coherence dynamics via Φ-normalization rather than solving traditional PDE closures alone.
claim_card.test_hook: Implement a Φ-tracking/Φ-normalizing solver variant and benchmark predictive stability/cost against a standard baseline on the same dataset.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: computational pathways for simulating coherence: recursive gradient solvers and Φ-normalization.
